mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medicine chest with key
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Whitall, Tatum, & Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: wood (plant material); glass (material); cork (bark); paper (fiber product) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Set includes: 9 clear glass medicine bottles with cork stoppers, 2 blue glass bottles with stoppers marked poison, vial of Calomel Powder by Taylor Drug Company, small bottle of gelatine-coated Podophyllin pills, and unused medicine bottle labels.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
